question:
Two identical pies were cut into a total of 16 equal pieces. If one of the resulting pieces was then split equally among three people, what fraction of a pie did each person receive?
A. \(\frac{1}{48}\)
B. \(\frac{1}{24}\)
C. \(\frac{1}{16}\)
D. \(\frac{3}{16}\)
E. \(\frac{3}{8}\)
Show
Hide
Answer
